> Elected City leadership is served by a Mayor and 5 City Council Members. Each fulfill a term of 2 years. The Council meets the first and third Tuesday of each month in the Council Chambers at City Hall. The public is invited to attend.

![](https://mpcity.net/wp-content/uploads/Lyon-headshot-356x400.jpg "Lyon headshot")
